name: Culture & Context
description: Region/culture-inspired motifs, materials, patterns, palette and objects (purely cultural; scene-agnostic)

example.prompt: minimalist material palette, shoji-like translucency, tatami-inspired textures, restrained neutrals with seasonal accent hues, kanji/katakana typographic motifs
example.video-generation-prompt: A tea room breathes in minimalist textures. Shoji-like translucency and tatami patterns meet restrained neutrals with delicate seasonal accents and kanji motifs.
